meanings.definition: dinos - a shortened form of the word 'dinosaur'
meanings.sent1: The museum had many dinos on display.
meanings.sent2: I love learning about dinos in history class.
meanings.sent3: The kids roared like dinos during the play.
meanings.sent4: The old bones in the desert resembled ancient dinos.
meanings.sent5: In my dream, I rode a dino through the jungle.

meanings.definition: dinos - plural form of the word 'dino'
meanings.sent1: Look at all the cute little dinos in the picture book.
meanings.sent2: The children played with their toy dinos in the sandbox.
meanings.sent3: The birthday cake was decorated with tiny dinos.
meanings.sent4: The store sold a set of colorful plastic dinos.
meanings.sent5: The classroom had a collection of toy dinos for playtime.

meanings.definition: dinos - a slang term for something cool or impressive
meanings.sent1: That skateboard trick was totally dinos!
meanings.sent2: The new video game is so dinos, everyone loves it.
meanings.sent3: His dance moves were so dinos, everyone cheered.
meanings.sent4: The concert was dinos, with amazing lights and music.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display was absolutely dinos, lighting up the sky.
